Text:
thanks

didn't know this was out.nice surprise, only season i lack

Sweet!!! Thank you Jerry
Was checking every week for this...
cheers mate
thank you jerry another surprise will carry on seeding as soon as my download finishes

hi Jerry...FYI, got a call today and have to travel on Friday 29th. As you know I am not a hit-and -run guy...I will continue seeding all Seasons 1-6  in a few weeks when I get back. Many thanks again for all your posts.
Cheers

Thanks for the upload, but no thanks for seeding this so poorly!  14 GB is too large a torrent -- as with the U.S. banks it needs to be broken up.

This morning I wasn't getting 50 KB / second on download speed. Not it isn't topping half that.

Come on, people!!  Don't make me look for RapidShare links that I may never find....

Thanks for the upload , but his is  the slowest torrent I've ever seen! Rarely are most of us seeing more than 50 KB /sec downooad speed.

Like the big banks, this needs to broken into smaller parts :  14 GB is too large.

u don't need to dl the entire torrent; I already had about half of the eps from another source. 

I agree its too big if its a private torrent, but here it does not matter
if anyone has problems getting the actual torrent bcuz of magnet links just google the torrent name and one of the mirror sites will show up

That's OK, Cindy.  I manage to complete the torrent when my friend came back -- twice to seed it to me.

So it only took less than 2 days to get 27 of those 37 episodes that I hadn't seen  vs. what would have otherwise been a full week!

it is the most ridiculous torrent I ever downlaoded; 8 seeders, 23 leechers and the speed is rarely over 5 kb/s now

I don't blame the uploader, but all those getting this torrent who just refuse to seed at all

Just a note to all potential Wagon Train season 6 downloaders. Please do not be discouraged by the presents of users who believe that by spamming someones torrent their download will mysteriously speed up. I guess they don't know that other users laugh at them for doing this and it gets them nowhere. For everyone else I would like to thank you for your support and keep an eye out for season 7, which will be coming soon.
Sweet will be watching for season 7....thank you very much
Uploaded 602GB of this torrent which is more than 42 times uploaded and still running...
Thanks so much! Will leave to seed!
